{{step[b7ec9e78-5b62-4235-a375-abc31978cf5d].schema}} 17f8b3dc3b0f101006f1600713efc425 b7ec9e78-5b62-4235-a375-abc31978cf5d 1
106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7 admin 2020-08-31 23:04:19 6ff8b3dc3b0f101006f1600713efc449 36 global admin 2020-12-03 00:31:45 sys_hub_step_instance 6ff8b3dc3b0f101006f1600713efc449 600 sys_variable_value admin 2020-08-31 23:04:19 67f8b3dc3b0f101006f1600713efc45c 28 admin 2020-12-03 00:31:45 (function execute(inputs, outputs) { /* * The format of the JSON output for a complex object schema must have a property called 'data' * with the following structure: * { * data: { * type: 'object', // required * children: [ // required - this is a collection of column definitions * { * label: 'Label 1', // required - key * name: 'Name 1', // required - unique name * type: 'string' // required - column type (it must be a complex object supported type¹) * }, * { * label: 'Label 2', * name: 'Name 2', * type: 'string' * }, * ], * } * } * */ var payload, changedFields, schema = []; try { payload = JSON.parse(inputs.payload) } catch (error) { outputs.error_message = "JSON parse error: " + e; return; } changedFields = payload.changed_fields if (changedFields && Array.isArray(changedFields)) { for (var i = 0; i < changedFields.length; i++) { var value = { label: changedFields[i].key, name: changedFields[i].key, type: getCOType(changedFields[i]) }; schema.push(value); } } else outputs.error_message = "Couldn't find 'changed_fields' array in the Payload"; outputs.schema = { data: { type: 'object', children: schema, }, }; function getCOType(field) { if (field) { if (Array.isArray(field.value)) //array check return "array.string"; else return "string"; } return "string"; } })(inputs, outputs); 71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719b sys_hub_step_instance 6ff8b3dc3b0f101006f1600713efc449 400 sys_variable_value admin 2020-08-31 23:04:19 a3f8b3dc3b0f101006f1600713efc45c 0 admin 2020-08-31 23:04:19 35aa573fd7802200bdbaee5b5e610375 f5e56d79b3101300176b051a16a8dce4 application 6ff8b3dc3b0f101006f1600713efc449 admin 2020-08-31 23:04:19 6ff8b3dc3b0f101006f1600713efc45b 0 admin 2020-08-31 23:04:19 var__m_sys_flow_step_definition_input_106afb6647032200b4fad7527c9a71e7
